contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 13, 1932 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Class 2)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Class 2) 20 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-class-2
Beautiful Britain
Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK March contest in conjunction with open section - 1st Abercynon, 2nd 5th Batt Welsh Regt, 3rd Glastonbury Town. Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £2. 8 bands competed.
Dec. 12, 2016, 4:17 p.m. Dec. 12, 2016, 4:25 p.m.

2 Bristol and District N.U.R. Noel Thorpe
